pageTitle: ONE by Ashley B Leather Jacket / Vest | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 22in / 56cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Imported, China. Leather clean. Lining: 100% polyester. Trim: 100% cotton. Shell: 100% lambskin. Fabric: Leather. Breezy chiffon lends a feminine touch to a pebbled leather moto jacket with detachable sleeves. A curved yoke lends a layered look, and an off-center zip closes the placket. A mix of zip and patch pockets detail the front. Lined Ashley B, part of Shopbop's ONE by collection. ONE by is home to exceptional pieces that represent the top of their categories.
